description.english: Your partner has been kidnapped.
Dumped your abusive ex.
Killed by the serial killer looming around.
All these bad things were the stalkers doing!
The Black Rose Killer was... Walter!?
Escaped before you were even captured.
That mystery friend is just the stalker...
Never take drinks from strangers! Good job!
Sebastian asked you out on a date.
Drinks with Sebastian
Olive quit her job and isn't coming back.
Allie is keeping her distance.
Successfully lied to Allie.
Alex is keeping his distance.
Sebastian used your fears against you.
Finding out the stalker's true identity.
Invited upstairs by Sebastian.
Got into Sebastian's play cupboard.
Cracked Sebastian's password.
Got Sebastian arrested.
A perfect ending.
Choosing your daddy.
Successfully escaped Sebastian.
Cooked for him so he could relax.
Broke up with your partner to protect them.
Followed through in an attempt to prove him wrong.
Made up with your partner.
It's ok, your partner knows your not at fault for this.
He's sorry, he didn't mean to scare you.
Your partner was murdered right before your eyes.
Set your partner free.
Killed your partner because you were told to.
Found out the identity of the stalker.
You and your partner break out of the basement.
Sebastian found and saved you.
Learn about David's time in the military.
Found the crate and called a Helicopter.
Escape the forest and find civilization.
Taking shelter in the woods.
Cuddling with David.
Landed a hit on David.
David keeps you alive for another round.
Find a supply crate that was prepared for this sick game.
Make David free you from the bear trap.
Meet Vivian.
Walter falls for you.
Escape with Vivian.
Walter lets you go.
Got your hand out of the cuff, no matter the cost.
Walter experiences empathy for you.
Got the knife by using the wire.
Cut Vivian's ropes with glass.
Killed her before she woke up.
Choosing to murder.
Followed, found and saved by Sebastian.
Found out that Daniela only cares for Allie.
Called for help right under Daniela's nose.
Snagged the WartenBerg Wheel.
Earned your way out of the cage.
Got the door off the hinges.
Mark found out he enjoys sadism.
Mark decides pain is the only thing you'll listen to.
You gave Mark a false confession.
Got blackmailed.
Adam came over.
Mark made you some tea.
Adam puts together that you are being stalked.
You escaped from your own apartment.
Through team work you and Adam call 911.
Adam  was worried about you and called.
Someone sent support.
Learned why Adam is doing this.
Adam took a life, just not yours...
You can't be in murdered if you're dead. Solid logic.
Found out the true killer behind Allie's death.
Justice but at what cost.
Saved, but not the way you expected.
Saw what's left of Allie.
Adam feels responsible.
Siding with Sebastian.
Adam got revenge for what happened to Allie.
Helping Adam realize he is not in his right mind right now.
Staying and helping Adam reach out for help.
Aquired a lock pick piece.
A viewer listened and called for help.
Rebecca lures Allie over.
Lock picked your way out of those cuffs.
Talked with Olivia.
Commanded Olive to release you.
Ordered a steak to go with your knife.
Talked Olive into not killing you.
Kept your beliefs clear. Did not get swayed.
Freed yourself from the chair.
Found Olive's parents in the backyard.
Damien does not tolerate violence... Specifically from you.
You didn't listen to his warning and got violent.
Found a box cutter knife.
Escaped through the window.
Found out what happened to Damien's mother.
You were deemed trust worthy by Damien and let upstairs.
